effect.@en:
Select one element: air, earth, fire or water. After successfully casting, a foe suffers one of the following Combat Conditions, unable to Defend or Resist its effects:

- AIR (Gutted): Must spend 1 additional AP forMovement Actions until the end of combat.

- EARTH (Strained): Must spend 1 additional AP for Attack Actions until the end of combat.

- FIRE (Intimidated): Suffer -1 to Damage Threshold & Peril Threshold until the end of combat.

- WATER (Disoriented): Must spend 1 additional AP for Reactions until the end of combat.

criticalSuccess.@en: The foe also drops one object either in hand or from their side 3 yards away.

criticalFailure.@en: You suffer the Combat Condition instead and drop one object either in hand or from your side 3 yards away.
